channel.title: DoubleDutch Developer Platform
channel.description: Information for building on the DoubleDutch platform

item.title: DDDP Version 2.0 Released
item.description: We are excited to announce version 2.0 of the DoubleDutch Developer Platform! We've made some improvements to the development tools and process, which will speed your development time and provide access to the latest features React and React Native…

item.title: Getting Started with DDDP
item.description: This article was updated on March 20, 2019 due to the release of the DoubleDutch Developer Platform v2.0 tools See this FAQ for non-engineers . The DoubleDutch Developer Platform supports developing standalone extensions that can be hosted within a…

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: What is the DoubleDutch Developer Platform (DDDP)? DDDP allows DoubleDutch customers and 3rd party developers to build extensions that can be installed to any DoubleDutch event app. What is an extension? An extension is a self-contained experience…

item.title: Web View Sections in a DoubleDutch event app
item.description: Getting started A web view can be embedded in any DoubleDutch event app via the DoubleDutch CMS. Layout > Add New Section > Web View Insert the URL of the web page to load. HTTPS is preferred. It can be an existing web page such as a Twitter feed…

item.title: Publishing and Installing Extensions
item.description: Publishing your DoubleDutch extension Once you have finished development, you will need to be provisioned for a DoubleDutch developer account before you can publish and install the extension in an event app. To request your developer credentials…
